summary: Jasmin ENB v4.3 Real Cinema update
descriptionHtml:
The Elderscrolls V Skyrim Jasmin ENB v4.4 Real graphic
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12549




The Elderscrolls V Skyrim Jasmin ENB v4.3 Real Cinema (update)



1. Graphic change


2. When you extract Jasmin ENB v4.3.zip, you would find 3 versions.


   1) (LOW) ENB
   
    1. letterbox OFF

    2. letterbox LOW

    3. letterbox MEDIUM

    4. letterbox HIGH



   2) (medium) ENB   <DOF>
   
    1. letterbox OFF

    2. letterbox LOW

    3. letterbox MEDIUM

    4. letterbox HIGH



   3) (high) ENB <AO+DOF>
   
    1. letterbox OFF

    2. letterbox LOW

    3. letterbox MEDIUM

    4. letterbox HIGH







The Elderscrolls V Skyrim Jasmin ENB v4.2 Real Cinema 



Specifications of Jasmin\'s System: CPU E6600 Core2Duo/ 3G Ram/ GPU GTS250 early model

Tested OS: windows 7 32 bit/ latest window update/ 


The author only used some retexture mods while testing this enb. 





Instructions to use Jasmin ENB v4.2 <PC>


1. Open SkyrimPrefs.ini located in My Document\\My Games\\Skyrim


2. Find the line, bFloatPointRenderTarget=0 from [Display] tap, and replace the number 0 with 1
Save and exit 
If that command line doesn\'t exist, input manually. This is a must to activate all the functions to use enb.


3. Make sure you don\'t use other graphic mods. If you have some installed already, delete those. 


4. When you extract Jasmin ENB v4.2.zip, you would find 2 versions.

High ENB  ( AO+DOF)
▽
letterbox High versions

letterbox Low versions


Medium ENB (DOF)
▽
letterbox High versions

letterbox Low versions


Choose one of them to your taste :) And open the folder. 
Copy all the contents including d3d9.dll and paste them 
into your Skyrim folder (not Data folder)



6. To uninstall, all you have to do is deleting d3d9.dll from your Skyrim folder.





Mod Introduction (Jasmin ENB v4.2)

I confidently introduce Jasmin ENB and it\'s the outcome of a lot of user feedbacks.
Thanks for all the feedbacks I\'ve given and those I would get :)


Jasmin ENB can always be modified and shared with the author\'s permission.

letterbox is my idea....(Jasmin)




The most important content of ENB is a palette file which has bmp as the file extension.
Modify the palette with photoshop first, and then configure enbseries.ini based on it.

Depth of Field effect used and modified in this ENB: Cinematic Setting 2.0.2 by Matso
The palette file used here: http://enbdev.com/palette_en.htm


HD6 (enbeffect.fx)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142


Scrapped from: http://blog.naver.com/r6angel/120151409527
Author\'s e-mail: r6angel@naver.com


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This graphics patch is an outcome of many user feedbacks in Korean Skyrim Forum.

Also, this is one of his tons of works here: http://blog.naver.com/r6angel

He covered many other popular games\' enbs as well, including Batman Arkham City, Battlefield 3, Saints Row 3, Call of Duty Modern Warfare 3, Mafia 2, Deus EX HR, FIFA 2012, PES 2012, Dead Island, Crysis 2, Bullet Strom, Bio Shock 2.. 

If you do like this patch, please endorse it :) And feedbacks are always welcome.


All credit goes to:

The develpoer of ENB, Boris Vorontsov : http://enbdev.com/

Matso (Depth of Field effect from Cinematic Settings v2.0.5) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5587

Jasmin (Author of this file) : http://blog.naver.com/r6angel
author: Jasmin
